channel.title: Problem loading sprites/anims
channel.description:
I am following Ric's webclient tutorial, but when I run my webclient none of the sprites or animations load. [URL=http://nl.tinypic.com/r/1zducsy/6]Here is a vid of this[/URL]
As you can see the player does not move, the sprites don't load, and the objects look frozen. How would I fix this?

item.title: Problem loading sprites/anims
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

i would update it a bit, maybe directly edit the cache for sprites. but most likely you did the tutorial wrong.

Read full topic
